resources.string: It was not possible to open Pictocreator, please make sure it is installed and updated.
It was not possible to open Category Manager, please make sure it is installed and updated.
When you have chosen the pictograms and categories you wish to return, you press this accept button.
If you can not find a desired pictogram, press this to open Pictocreator and create one.
If you can not find a desired category, press this to open Category Manager and create one.
If a pictogram have this icon in bottom right corner, it is a category.
This dropdown shows the categories available to the chosen citizen. It is updated while searching.
Would you like to exit Pictosearch without getting the search result?
Would you return complete categories? \nCategories could contain lots of pictograms.
You have chosen to return a lot of pictograms. \nAre you sure?

The search did not return anything 

To search on multiple sentences, 
it is required to comma separate the sentences.
Are you sure you will exit Pictosearch when you have pictograms and categories in the checkout list? \n\nThey will not be returned to the previous application.
Are you sure you will exit Pictosearch when you have pictograms in the checkout list? \n\nThey will not be returned to the previous application.
Are you sure you will exit Pictosearch when you have categories in the checkout list? \n\nThey will not be returned to the previous application.
Are you sure you will exit Pictosearch when you have a pictogram in the checkout list? \n\nIt will not be returned to the previous application.
Are you sure you will exit Pictosearch when you have a category in the checkout list? \n\nIt will not be returned to the previous application.
This pictogram is already in the checkout list.
This category is already in the checkout list.
